DOC.brief_summary: RAND/UCLA modified Delphi study on quality indicators for STEMI to determine the appropriateness of quality indicators retrieved from literature and guideline review. We aim to engage 20 cardiologists and 20 nurses with relevant experience in the care for STEMI patients.
DOC.brief_title: CP4ACS - Delphi Study to Determine Appropriateness of STEMI Quality Indicators in Belgium
DOC.criteria: cardiologist or cardio nurse with relevant experience in the care for STEMI patients
